summary_multilingual.en: In this episode of Vitto Live AgTech in 5 minutes, we talk with Bruno from DeepAgro about a smart spraying system that uses artificial intelligence to detect weeds and apply herbicide only where it is needed. The solution allows for a significant reduction in input consumption, simplifies logistics, and reduces environmental impact. Bruno also shares the experience of a traditional farmer who, after adopting the technology, inspired his neighbors to do the same. A brief and concrete case on how innovation can make agricultural work more profitable and sustainable.
